title: A Toboggan

children.value: A toboggan is sliding down a hillside with a uniform acceleration.
What is the resultant force acting on the toboggan?

choices.value: It is proportional to the displacement from a fixed point.

answer.value: The correct answer is (b). This just relies on a statement of Newton's Second Law.
